Plot: Seeing a way to reassert control over her adult son's life when he faces manslaughter charges, an affluent Romanian woman sets out on a campaign of emotional and social manipulation to keep...
Title: Child's Pose
Actors: Luminita Gheorghiu, Bogdan Dumitrache, Natasa Raab, Ilinca Goia
tomatoConsensus: It isn't necessarily an easy watch, but thanks to Netzer's interesting direction and a riveting performance from Gheorghiu, Child's Pose is rewarding.
